meanings.sent1: Wearing a raincoat on a sunny day is unnecessary.
meanings.sent2: Bringing an umbrella to a movie theater is unnecessary.
meanings.sent3: Carrying a snow shovel to the beach would be unnecessary.
meanings.sent4: Packing a winter coat for a summer vacation is unnecessary.
meanings.sent5: Having a backup generator for a one-hour power outage is unnecessary.

meanings.sent1: Eating three desserts after dinner is unnecessary.
meanings.sent2: Buying ten pairs of shoes in one day is unnecessary.
meanings.sent3: Decorating a cake with a hundred candles would be unnecessary.
meanings.sent4: Wearing five layers of clothing in mild weather is unnecessary.
meanings.sent5: Using twenty different apps to do one task is unnecessary.
